text: Olav Thon (29 June 1923 – 16 November 2024) was a Norwegian real estate developer. His real estate company, the Olav Thon Group, is Norway's largest private real estate company."Tobacco heir emerges as Norway’s wealthiest", Aftenposten, October 19, 2006. In 2007, Thon had a net worth of NOK 20.8 billion, which made him Norway's 2nd richest person. Thon was born in Ål, Norway. Thon turned turned 100 in June 2023. He died on 16 November 2024 in Oslo, Norway at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Real estate developers Category:Norwegian businesspeople Category:Centenarians
title: Olav Thon
